text: Bernero is an Italian surname that may refer to *Adam Bernero (born 1976), American baseball pitcher *Edward Allen Bernero (born 1962), American television writer, producer, and director *Giovanni Battista Bernero (1736–1796), Italian sculptor *Virgil Bernero (born 1964), American politician ==See also== *16051 Bernero, a minor planet Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Bernero
